ovdesc.p: The purpose of AA.ACTIVITY.CALC.TYPE is to specify a method by which the base amount for charge calculation will be arrived. This is mainly used for getting the base amount for Activity based charges.

desc.p: Allows to specify a description for the Activity calculation type record.
Can be any valid alphanumeric characters
maximum 35 characters
Minimum 3 characters
This field stores the override that was generated when the record was commit. No input, system updated field
The ID can be any valid alphanumeric characters.
Validation rules
Should be a valid alphanumeric character
maximum 30 characters
Specifies the end day of the month that can be used to restrict the period that HIGHEST and LOWEST calculations are performed.
For example of the highest balance check only up to the 20th of the month this will contain 20
This is an optional field.
Should be between the range 1 to 31
Only allowed if CALCULATION = HIGHEST or LOWEST
Specifies the Start day of the month that can be used to restrict the period that HIGHEST and LOWEST calculations are performed.
For example of the highest balance check only applies from 10th of the month this will contain 10.
This is an optional field.
Should be between the range 1 to 31
Only allowed if CALCULATION = HIGHEST or LOWEST
Identifies how the activity value for the calculation should be determined. Values available initially are:
ROUTINE – calculation is based on the API defined in the ROUTINE field
CURRENT – the value of the CURRENT activity
TURNOVER – the value of the activities since this charge was last applied
COUNT – the number of activities since this charge was last applied
For future releases the additional values should be available:
AVERAGE – the average value of the activities in the period should be used
HIGHEST – the highest value in the period should be used
LOWEST – the lowest value in the period should be used
This field is mandatory
Validation rules
Should be any one of the valid values defined for the field.
Routine to calculate the base value for the calculation.
Mandatory if the CALCULATION is set to ROUTINE
Validation rules
Should be a valid entry in EB.API
